title: Autonomous Drone Delivery
description: Developed a system to enable autonomous drone delivery of small packages. Utilized computer vision for obstacle detection and avoidance.

title: Home Automation System
description: Created a home automation system that allows users to control appliances remotely through a mobile app. Integrated IoT devices and implemented security features.

title: Robotic Arm Control
description: Built a robotic arm control interface for precise movements and manipulation tasks. Implemented kinematics algorithms for motion planning.

title: Self-Driving Car Prototype
description: Developed a prototype of a self-driving car using machine learning algorithms for perception and decision-making. Tested in various simulated and real-world environments.

title: Smart Agriculture Monitoring
description: Designed a system for monitoring and managing agricultural resources using IoT sensors and data analytics. Improved crop yield and resource efficiency.

title: Virtual Reality Simulation
description: Created a virtual reality simulation environment for training purposes in various fields such as medicine, aviation, and construction. Implemented realistic interactions and scenarios.

title: Drone Photography Platform
description: Developed a platform for drone photography enthusiasts to share their aerial photographs and videos. Implemented features for community engagement and content discovery.

title: Chatbot for Customer Support
description: Designed a chatbot system to handle customer inquiries and support requests efficiently. Integrated natural language processing for accurate responses.

title: Augmented Reality Navigation
description: Implemented an augmented reality navigation system for indoor and outdoor environments. Integrated real-time positioning and mapping technologies.

title: Smart Energy Management
description: Developed a smart energy management system for optimizing energy usage in residential and commercial buildings. Utilized IoT sensors and predictive analytics.
